comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2890280748/ wrtt John L. Stevens. Could this woman be an older version of Rowena Edson Stevens as at celebratesuffrage2008.org/History.php ? Or as at www.ames.lib.ia.us/farwell/publication/Pub2199.htm ? If so, that would confirm this as being Judge John Loomis Stevens of Iowa.

comment.author: 31821737@N06
comment._content: This is Judge John Loomis Stevens and his wife Rowena Edson Stevens.  They were my great great grandparents.  He was a candidate for Governor of Iowa and this photo actually appeared in a 1912 publication regarding his candidacy.
